Melee Weapon Attack:
 +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 
Hit:
 10 (4d4) piercing
damage, or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

description: Medium swarm of Tiny beasts, unaligned

The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a
Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

name: Swarm of Insects
